    • Method Detail

      • checkIfExists

        public boolean checkIfExists(java.lang.String name,
                             java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> list)
        This method chcecks if user input is already saved to an arraylist.
        Parameters:
        name - is the user input value.
        list - is the arraylist to be searched.
        Returns:
        this method returns true when user input is already found in the arraylist and false otherwise.

      • delete

        public void delete(java.lang.String tableName,
                   java.lang.String row,
                   android.content.Context context)
        This method allows the user to delete a table or a row in a table by clicking a button. It starts a new activity.
        Parameters:
        tableName - is the name of the table from which one row is to be deleted. When the user chooses to delete a table, the value of this parameter is "TABLE_OF_TABLES".
        row - is the row to be deleted from the table. When the user chooses to delete a table, the value of this parameter is the name of the table to be deleted.
        context -

      • edit

        public void edit(java.lang.String tableName,
                 android.content.Context context)
        This method is called when the user chooses to edit selected table contents. It starts a new activity.
        Parameters:
        tableName - is the name of the table to be altered.
        context -

      • revise

        public void revise(java.lang.String tableName,
                   android.content.Context context)
        This method is called when the user chooses to view selected table contents. It starts a new activity.
        Parameters:
        tableName - is the name of the selected table.
        context -

      • deleteRow

        public void deleteRow(java.lang.String tableName,
                      java.lang.String row,
                      android.content.Context context)
        This method is called when the user chooses to delete a table row and confirms their choice. It deletes the selected row by calling the DeleteRow method in the RevisionMasterDatabaseHelper class.
        Parameters:
        tableName - is the name of the table from which the row is to be deleted.
        row - is the value of a column in the row to be deleted.
        context -

      • deleteTable

        public void deleteTable(java.lang.String row,
                        android.content.Context context)
        This method is called when the user chooses to delete a table and confirms their choice. It deletes the selected table by calling the DeleteTable method in the RevisionMasterDatabaseHelper class.
        Parameters:
        row - is the name of the table to be deleted.
        context -
